postToolUse.title: File Modification Detection

filterRules.title: Filter Rules
filterRules.subtitle: (skip if any condition is met)
skipConditions: File name is PROJECT_INDEX.md or FOLDER_INDEX.md
File extension is not a code file (.js/.ts/.py/.java/.rs/.go/.cpp/.c/.h/.kt/.rb/.php/.swift/.cs)
File path contains: node_modules, .git, dist, build, .next, target, vendor, __pycache__, .cache

structuralChange.title: Structural Change Detection
structuralChange.subtitle: (must contain any of the following keywords)
keywords: Dependencies: import, require, use, from, #include, using
Exports: export, public, class, interface, function, def, fn, async, struct

updateStrategy.title: Update Strategy
strategies: Structural change detected → Update file header + FOLDER_INDEX + PROJECT_INDEX
Header-only change → Update file header only

postToolUse.output: Silent processing, only prompt when major changes occur.

stop.message: Session end check: If 3+ code files were modified, briefly ask user if /check-index is needed. Keep it short, don't prompt if no obvious issues.
